name: Domino King! - Android
description:
Domino King is a game, best experienced on a tablet, in which the goal is to topple dominoes onto the buttons at the end of every level.

There are a total of 18 levels, each with different mechanics.

You can check my other games here: (Itch.io) and here: (Google Play)

Made with Construct 2 Personal Edition;

Art made with Paint.Net.
